senses.ex: I can't figure out how to do this math problem.

Tips.title: Problem Solving
Tips.description: Used when you're actively trying to solve a challenging problem or question. It indicates a process.
Tips.example: She's trying to figure out the best way to approach her boss.

Tips.title: Context Clues
Tips.description: Pay attention to surrounding words for hints about solving or understanding the issue at hand.
Tips.example: From the manual, I needed to figure out the next step.

senses.ex: Can you figure out how much money we need for the trip?

Tips.title: Calculation
Tips.description: Often involves math or careful planning; may not have an immediate or obvious answer.
Tips.example: You'll need to figure out your expenses before making a budget.

Tips.title: Estimation
Tips.description: Used when exact numbers aren't known, and you need an educated guess.
Tips.example: Can you figure out roughly how many guests will come?

senses.de: To come to understand a person or their behavior
senses.ex: I can't figure out why he said that.

Tips.title: Understanding Behavior
Tips.description: Attempting to understand why someone behaves a certain way or makes certain choices.
Tips.example: It's tough to figure out why she avoids social events.

Tips.title: Interpersonal Insight
Tips.description: Use it when trying to better understand someone's character or motive.
Tips.example: I need to figure out my partner's likes and dislikes.
